title: Craw

properties.name: description
properties.value: Craw was a follower of Armadyl and fought for him during the God Wars. He was described as a formidable follower, an expert with the bow. Craw personally eliminated some of Armadyl's greatest enemies.

content:
For his bow, see Craw's bow.
Craw's bow, the only memento of one of Armadyl's most formidable followers.

Craw was a follower of Armadyl and fought for him during the God Wars. He was described as a formidable follower, an expert with the bow. Craw personally eliminated some of Armadyl's greatest enemies.

When the God Wars ended, Craw was one of the many soldiers killed in the destruction of Forinthry. Now, an undead Craw can be found amongst the revenants of the Wilderness, still wielding the trusted bow that helped them in the past[1].

Craw's bow is now a possible drop from revenants. It gives a significant boost in Ranged accuracy and damage when fighting monsters in the Wilderness.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ . "Revenant Cave Rewards: Revisited, Content Poll & Theatre of Blood". 28th June 2018. Developers' Blogs. *

[[File:Craw's bow detail.png|right|150px|thumb|[[Craw's bow]], the only memento of one of [[Armadyl]]'s most formidable followers.]]
'''Craw''' was a follower of [[Armadyl]] and fought for him during the [[God Wars]]. He was described as a formidable follower, an expert with the [[Craw's bow|bow]]. Craw personally eliminated some of Armadyl's greatest enemies. 

When the God Wars ended, Craw was one of the many soldiers killed in the destruction of [[Forinthry]]. Now, an undead Craw can be found amongst the revenants of the [[Wilderness]], still wielding the trusted bow that helped them in the past{{CiteDevBlog |author= |url=https://secure.runescape.com/m=news/revenant-cave-rewards-revisited-content-poll--theatre-of-blood?oldschool=1&utm_campaign=osrs-tob&utm_term=revenant-changes-content-poll-tob |title=Revenant Cave Rewards: Revisited, Content Poll & Theatre of Blood |blogdate=28th June 2018 |date=06:00, June 28, 2018 (UTC) |notes= |name= }}.

[[Craw's bow|Craw's bow]] is now a possible drop from revenants. It gives a significant boost in Ranged accuracy and damage when fighting monsters in the Wilderness.
